description:
THIS COURSE IS DESIGNED TO:

  • rid all the doubt
  • rid the bad beliefs {Low, Affordable, Reach All}
  • provide the principles to dramatically increase price
  • provide the tools and pricing structures to dramatically increase revenue

WHAT DO I GET MIKE?

  • Videos: 14 high quality videos, split in two parts
    • Part 1: consists of the pricing principles
      • understanding allow us to drastically increase pricing
    • Part 2: consist of case studies
      • principles in action
      • actual results of actual businesses
      • examples revenue jumps in the order of 2 x and 4 x
  • Free 1-1 personal call
    • Implement these tools for your biz

WE ARE GREAT AT CREATING OUR THING:

  • Building products
  • Providing services

WE START WITH POOR BASIC BIZ SKILLS:

  • saying no
  • negotiation
  • selling
  • price setting

ALL I KNOW IS I WANT TO:

  • price low
  • keep it affordable
  • reach as many as possible


BUT ...

  • Am I leaving too much on the table …
  • Others charge 2x the price I do ...

If you get this right you biz will grow almost on autopilot.

If you get this wrong you’ll be in a pricing war with your competition and a race to the bottom.


AVOID the pricing battles that tank so many businesses

AVOID the hard learnt lessons and what you think you know {Low, Affordable, Reach All}

GET the counterintuitive that only comes from actual experience

GET the tools and methods that install massive confidence in your business

Defining your price, defines your business

Set your biz up to win … Join me inside.


WHAT THIS COURSE IS NOT:

  • No theory
  • No grey beards
  • You won’t see this in a text

This is growth hacking and these tools & methods have come from the front line trenches

They are tried, tested, true and based on actual results of many companies.
title: Growth Hacker Pricing Strategies
